search.COMMENT: Even though this XML search will probably load and is a good start toward a completed search, please be aware that this search will probably not work as is and will probably require some changes.
search.name: PubMed
search.description:
Search the PubMed journals database
Examples:
pmid 12429004 for a specific publication
pmid Reeves Ginifer for a name search
pmid transdermal intravenous fentanyl for a keyword search

form.name: pmidf
form.COMMENT:
The input element above, "db", was a SELECT element with the following options...
PubMed Protein Nucleotide Structure Genome Books 3D Domains Domains Gene GEO GEO DataSets Journals MeSH NCBI Web Site OMIM PMC PopSet SNP Taxonomy UniGene UniSTS
The following field was active (i.e. had focus) when the search was generated.
